sentences: Ta on ainuke, kes saab mind mÃµista.
Ainuke asi, mida ma tean, on see, et ma ei tea midagi.
Ta oli ainuke inimene, kes mulle kaasa tuli.
context: The word 'ainuke' is used to describe something or someone that is the only one of its kind, and it can be translated to English as 'only one' or 'the only'.
